name: Cthulhu Virtual Pet
description: Have you ever dreamed of having a Lovecraftian God in your pocket and being able to take care of him? Well... um, no. It doesn't matter, because even if you don't know who Lovecraft is, you can have your pocket Cthulhu to take with you 24 hours a day. So enough curiosity and have fun with this retro 8bit virtual pet the same way you used to play when you were a kid. And if you're a kid, enjoy and enjoy a 90's moment.
